trans-unit.resname: H17·1 | Grimlock, Dinobot Leader | Card Name
H17·1 | Grimlock, Dinobot Leader | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Dinosaurs, Vehicles, and other Transformers® creatures you control get +2/+0.
trans-unit.target: Dinosaurs, Vehicles, and other Transformers® creatures you control get +2/+0.

trans-unit.resname: H17·1 | Grimlock, Dinobot Leader | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: CARDNAME becomes Grimlock, Ferocious King.
trans-unit.target: {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: CARDNAME becomes Grimlock, Ferocious King.

trans-unit.resname: H17·1 | Grimlock, Dinobot Leader | Flavor Text
H17·1 | Grimlock, Ferocious King | Card Name
H17·1 | Grimlock, Ferocious King | Card Text | Paragraph 1
H17·1 | Grimlock, Ferocious King | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: CARDNAME becomes Grimlock, Dinobot Leader.
trans-unit.target: {2}, Convert a Transformers toy you own to its other mode: CARDNAME becomes Grimlock, Dinobot Leader.

trans-unit.resname: H17·1 | Grimlock, Ferocious King | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Why you think Grimlock stupid? Me not stupid. Grimlock smartest Dinobot."
trans-unit.target: "Why you think Grimlock stupid? Me not stupid. Grimlock smartest Dinobot."

trans-unit.resname: H17·2 | Nerf War | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Fire a Nerf® blaster until empty at target library from at least two meters away. For each card knocked off that library, put it into its owner's graveyard and CARDNAME deals ½ damage to that player. (Foam darts only.)
trans-unit.target: Fire a Nerf® blaster until empty at target library from at least two meters away. For each card knocked off that library, put it into its owner's graveyard and CARDNAME deals ½ damage to that player. (Foam darts only.)

trans-unit.source: "I'll tell you one thing—it's not nothin'!"\n—Garj Grabclaw, goblin sergeant
trans-unit.target: "I'll tell you one thing—it's not nothin'!"\n—Garj Grabclaw, goblin sergeant

trans-unit.resname: H17·3 | Sword of Dungeons & Dragons | Card Name
H17·3 | Sword of Dungeons & Dragons | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from Rogues and from Clerics.
trans-unit.target: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from Rogues and from Clerics.

trans-unit.resname: H17·3 | Sword of Dungeons & Dragons | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a 4/4 gold Dragon creature token with flying and roll a d20 (a twenty-sided die). If you roll a 20, repeat this process.
trans-unit.target: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, create a 4/4 gold Dragon creature token with flying and roll a d20 (a twenty-sided die). If you roll a 20, repeat this process.

trans-unit.resname: H17·3 | Sword of Dungeons & Dragons | Card Text | Paragraph 3
